20101230220904.000|20101230220906.000|TR0|get rid of about 60 tons an hour using 
20101230220906.000|20101230220908.000|TR0|this process.

20101230220912.000|20101230220914.000|TR0|designed drain and into a manhole that are

20101230220948.000|20101230220950.000|TR0|tomorrow night. And the workers here 
20101230220950.000|20101230220952.000|TR0|insist they will be working around the

20101230222839.000|20101230222841.000|TR0|-- and sleep at night with peace of mind.

20101230223755.000|20101230223757.000|TR0|
20101230223757.000|20101230223759.000|TR0|LAWRENCE:  So, basically, the government 
20101230223759.000|20101230223801.000|TR0|seems to have caved under public pressure.
20101230223801.000|20101230223803.000|TR0|
20101230223803.000|20101230223805.000|TR0|Now, nearly 1,000 people have been charged 
20101230223805.000|20101230223808.000|TR0|with blasphemy, but most cases have been 
20101230223808.000|20101230223810.000|TR0|thrown out on appeal, and no one has ever 
20101230223810.000|20101230223812.000|TR0|been executed.  But more than 30 people 
20101230223812.000|20101230223814.000|TR0|have been killed on the street after being 
20101230223814.000|20101230223816.000|TR0|acquitted or while out on bail awaiting 
20101230223816.000|20101230223818.000|TR0|trial -- Suzanne.

20101230224709.000|20101230224711.000|TR0|pushback reaction.
20101230224711.000|20101230224713.000|TR0|
20101230224713.000|20101230224715.000|TR0|This is a smart reaction because it's a 
20101230224715.000|20101230224718.000|TR0|reaction to 2,000-plus legislative

20101230224742.000|20101230224745.000|TR0|and the reading of it I think is, while

20101230224755.000|20101230224757.000|TR0|That's what --
20101230224757.000|20101230224759.000|TR0|
20101230224759.000|20101230224801.000|TR0|ROSEN:  There's nothing wrong with it.
20101230224801.000|20101230224803.000|TR0|
20101230224803.000|20101230224805.000|TR0|MATALIN:  It did start with health care.

20101230224807.000|20101230224809.000|TR0|said -- the public said in election after 
20101230224809.000|20101230224811.000|TR0|election, in poll after poll, they didn't
